::Ramulus::

Ramulus' eyes light up as Brix offers for him to go with them. "Sure!" he 
says, suddenly remembering about SnowCat.

"Will you be allright for now?" he asks, "When you're done repairing call 
Striker on your comm-link, he's ussually stationed here."
